mapper.select: SELECT s.suggestion_no , s.loginID , s.suggestion_category , s.suggestion_title , s.suggestion_content , DATE_FORMAT(s.suggestion_created_at, '%y-%m-%d') as suggestion_created_at , f.file_no , f.file_server_path , f.file_local_path , f.file_origin , f.file_rename , f.file_extension , f.file_size FROM tb_suggestion s LEFT JOIN tb_file f ON s.file_no = f.file_no WHERE s.suggestion_no = #{suggestion_no}

SELECT reply.suggestion_reply_content , f.file_server_path , f.file_local_path , f.file_origin , f.file_rename , f.file_extension , f.file_size FROM tb_suggestion_reply reply LEFT JOIN tb_file f ON reply.file_no = f.file_no WHERE reply.suggestion_no = #{suggestion_no}
SELECT file_server_path , file_origin FROM tb_file WHERE file_no = #{file_no}
